name: Main Street Bancshares, Inc.
description: Main Street Bancshares, Inc. is a financial services company based in the United States, primarily focused on providing banking and financial solutions to individuals and small to medium-sized businesses. Founded in 2004, the company operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Main Street Bank, which offers a wide range of services including personal banking, business banking, mortgage lending, and wealth management. Main Street Bancshares is dedicated to enhancing the financial well-being of its customers through tailored financial products and exceptional customer service. The bank aims to cultivate long-term relationships with clients by understanding their unique financial needs and delivering personalized solutions. With a commitment to community involvement, Main Street Bancshares actively participates in local initiatives and supports various charitable organizations. The company continues to expand its footprint in the banking sector while embracing technological advancements to enhance the customer experience and streamline banking operations.

seo.meta_title: Main Street Bancshares, Inc. | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Main Street Bancshares, Inc., a community-focused bank offering personalized banking and financial services for individuals and businesses.

faq.question: What services does Main Street Bank offer?
faq.answer: Main Street Bank offers personal banking, business banking, mortgage lending, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Main Street Bancshares?
faq.answer: Jeffrey E. L. McClain is the CEO of Main Street Bancshares, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Main Street Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Main Street Bank is headquartered in Fairfax, Virginia, USA.

faq.question: When was Main Street Bancshares founded?
faq.answer: Main Street Bancshares was founded in 2004.
